document.full_text: syrian president bashar al-assad's efforts to contain an unprecedented wave of protests face a key test on friday, after he unveiled a new cabinet and ordered detainees released in a bid to ease tensions.
document.title: syria's assad seeks to curb prayer protests
lines_and_colors: syrian president bashar al-assad's efforts to contain an unprecedented wave of protests face a key test on friday, after he unveiled a new cabinet and ordered detainees released in a bid to ease tensions.
